sentences.en: Accountant John Talbot is a wizard with numbers.
sentences.cn: 会计师约翰·塔尔博特精通数字。

sentences.en: Captures video, audio, or still images using the Capture Wizard.
sentences.cn: 使用“捕获向导”捕获视频 、 音频或静止图像.

sentences.en: Contains shortcuts that the Desktop Cleanup Wizard moved here.
sentences.cn: 包含“桌面清理向导”移动到此的快捷方式.

sentences.en: Do you know there's a wizard in Nepal who's growing gravity - resistant trees?
sentences.cn: 你知不知道尼泊尔有位巫师在种植 反 地心引力树木?

sentences.en: He was a wizard with camels.
She's a wizard at playing harp.
The guy was trying to cast a spell on me, like a wizard.
sentences.cn: 那家伙试图向我下咒, 像巫师一样.

sentences.en: The Upsizing Wizard can export table attributes in addition to data.
sentences.cn: “升迁向导”不仅可以导出数据,而且还可以导出表属性.

sentences.en: The wizard clapped a pudgy hand to his vast forehead.
sentences.cn: 巫师用胖乎乎的手拍了一下宽大的前额.

sentences.en: This concludes the demo of the Preinstallation Kit Wizard.
sentences.cn: 该操作将结束预安装库向导的演示.

sentences.en: This wizard adds a member function to a class, struct, or union.
sentences.cn: 本向导向类 、 结构或联合添加成员函数.

sentences.en: This wizard automatically detects and installs new Plug and Play printers.
sentences.cn: 这个向导自动检测并安装新的即插即用打印机.

sentences.en: Wizard Wong had glanced at the tape several times.
sentences.cn: 翁“魔术师”已经对磁带瞥了好几眼.

sentences.en: You think we can muster up enough wizard power to pull it off.
sentences.cn: 你认为我们能够集合起足够的能量来施法吗?

words.tran_cn: 神奇的，奇异的；男巫的；神汉的

trans.tran_cn: 男巫，行家，奇才，向导（程序）
trans.tran_en: a man who is supposed to have magic powers
